column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=It had been a while since I got my hair cut .
#id=2
#text=My ends were fried , frizzy , and dry .
#id=3
#text=I did n't want to do it .
#id=4
#text=I did n't want to spend the money , but I succumbed and walked into the salon .
#id=5
#text=I had n't made an appointment and therefore was told they could fit me in a half an hour from now .
#id=6
#text=I nodded to wait and took a seat .
#id=7
#text=I flipped through the magazines for hair inspirations and looked at my phone .
#id=8
#text=When the time had passed , the stylist called my name .
#id=9
#text=She sat me down and asked me what I would like .
#text=I told her to cut off the damaged parts , but nothing fancy .
#text=She took me over to the sinks to wash my hair .
#text=After washing and conditioning it , she guided me back over to the chair and draped a cloak over me .
#text=She combed out my long hair and began snipping .
#text=After she was done , she blew dry the front part of my hair .
#text=I paid at the register and walked over to give her a $ 5 tip to thank her .
#text=My head felt lighter and I was happy with how it looked .
